title: Unable to download ICICI Mobile Banking App - iMobile
content:
Hi,
I have seen that few of the applications which I try to download from the playstore show this message. Attached screenshots for reference.

Coming to iMobile by ICICI, I have not installed this app before. I generally search on google to find the latest .apk file but that also expires after the update happens.

What could be the issue for this? I have also upgraded the firmware to android 11.
 I require this app for my banking purpose but, can't download.

Please look into this matter asap.
